Sequence Information.Source: Odorrana versabilis (Chinese bamboo leaf odorous frog) (Rana versabilis)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22450466]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC2592 (MIC=19 µM), Bacillus licheniformis X39 (MIC=37.5 µM), Rhodococcus rhodochrous X15 (MIC=9.5 µM), Enterococcus faecium 091299 (MIC=19 µM), E. faecalis 981 (MIC=19 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Psychrobacter faecalis X29 (MIC=9.5 µM);Fungi:Slime mould 090223 (MIC=1.2 µM), Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=19-37.5 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and fungi but has weak or no activity against a range of Gram-negative bacteria except P. faecalis. Has hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Amphibian skin peptides and their corresponding cDNAs from single lyophilized secretion samples identification of novel brevinins from three species of Chinese frogs.
Literature.Author: Chen T, Li L, Zhou M, Rao P, Walker B, Shaw C.

Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides isolated from the skin secretions of Hainan odorous frog, Odorrana hainanensis.
Literature.Author: Wang H, Yu Z, Hu Y, Li F, Liu L, Zheng H, Meng H, Yang S, Yang X, Liu J.

Literature.Title: Amphibian skin peptides and their corresponding cDNAs from singlelyophilized secretion samples: identification of novel brevinins fromthree species of Chinese frogs.
Literature.Author: Walker B.,Rao P.,Zhou M.,Li L.,Chen T.
